p: Hydrodistillation of the dried parts (fruits, leaves, and roots) and in vitro-derived shoot culture of E. maritimum gave the essential oils in the yield of 0.30%, 0.06%, 0.01%, and 0.01%, respectively. These values have been in accordance with the earlier data that reported 0.31–0.93% for the fruit [ 18] and 0.06–0.13% for the aerial part [ 17] of the essential oil of this species.
